local_intent: Execute a pull along +Y, pause briefly, and verify the dishwasher door is open; retry up to three times.
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer phase: pull (MoveDelta y=0.2, 1200ms) → wait (400ms) → verify ContainerOpen(dishwasher) with RetryUntilSuccessful(3), matching the GLOBAL_BT and stepwise plan.
